title.en: Gennai's Wanderings: A Record of his Explorations of Edo

altTitles.ja: そぞろ源内 大江戸さぐり控え帳

description.en:
"There are no strange phenomena in the world."
A suspenseful mystery period drama by Seisaku Kana!

The time is Edo, the mid-18th century.
In this metropolis of the early modern period, where strange and rational, human and supernatural phenomena coexist,
there was a man who, at his whim, stuck his nose into strange incidents.
His name was Gennai Hiraga, a botanist.
While studying in Edo, he teams up with Genpaku Sugita, a mad Dutch doctor who loves dissections, andinvestigates strange incidents in Edo. 

This is the most popular series in the Comic Ran Twins magazine.
The first new book in four years from the No. 1 erotic artist, Seisaku Kana! A grand opening to an entertaining suspenseful period drama that
cuts through the strange and mysterious darkness of Edo with intelligence ! (Author) Manga: Seisaku Kana Manga artist and illustrator. Since the 1970s, his manga for young men, such as "Auction House" and "Experimental Doll Dummy Oscar," based on the original works of Kazuo Koike, have become popular, and he is currently active in period drama magazines. He is also recognized as a pioneer of digital drawing using Photoshop. Scenario: Akira Amasawa Screenwriter, playwright, and novelist. In addition to writing scripts for many TV dramas and anime, his recent works include the novel "Oedo Kodomo Torimonochō" (Bunken Publishing). He also adapted the manga "Kenkaku Shobai" (manga by Yasuichi Oshima, original story by Shotaro Ikenami, published by LEED Publishing).
